text_block_list.text:
Lookie here. It shows a square with 
oh-so many dots... I wonder what to 
do next.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Dots in a square? 
Oh, that's a QR code.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
It's a way of transferring data by taking 
a picture of it.
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Ah, let me help you out. I'll take a 
picture and send you the URL. 
Alright...
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Oh, you're taking a picture? 
Peace!
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Fufu, thank you very much. 
Can I make it my wallpaper, I wonder?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
You wanted me to take a picture of the 
square with the many dots in it, right?
text_block_list.name: Transcend

text_block_list.text:
Ah, that one. Let me bring it up again. 
... Oh? Where might the square have 
gone off to?
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
This button... No, this one? 
... Oh shucks. The screen has turned 
all black.
text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute

text_block_list.text:
Ahaha... Calm down, alright? 
Let's go over this slowly...
text_block_list.name: Transcend
